Header: Prefects Receive Laurels from West Commander
Content: Major General Sathyapriya Liyanage, Commander, Security Forces - West (SF-West) and Colonel Commandant Sri Lanka Armoured Corps was invited to be the Chief Guest at the Prefects’ investiture ceremony at Lindsay Girls’ School at Bambalapitiya on Monday (18). Commander, Security Forces – West on arrival at the school premises was welcomed by a student prefect of the school at the venue. 50 plus prefects of the Lindsay Girls’ School received their symbolic laurels during this ceremony. After the investiture, Major General Sathyapriya Liyanage made a brief address to the gathering and motivated the students.
